soma.core.controller.Command

Class that will be instantiated when a registered event is dispatched, the framework will automatically call the execute method.

Example

Register a command

this.addCommand("eventType", MyCommand);

Create a command class

var MyCommand = new Class({
    Extends:soma.core.controller.Command,
    execute: function(event) {
        // do something
    }
});
Summary
soma.core.controller.CommandClass that will be instantiated when a registered event is dispatched, the framework will automatically call the execute method.
Functions
executeCalled automatically when the framework execute the command.
Variables
body (DOM element)Get the body of the document.
instance (soma.core.Application)Retrieves the instance of the framework.
Functions
dispatchEventDispatches an event into the framework.
addEventListenerRegisters an event listener object with an EventDispatcher object so that the listener receives notification of an event.
removeEventListenerRemoves a listener from the EventDispatcher object.
hasWireIndicates whether a wire has been registered to the framework.
getWireRetrieves the wire instance that has been registered using its name.
addWireRegisters a wire to the framework.
removeWireRemoves a wire from the framework and call the dispose method of this wire.
hasModelIndicates wether a model has been registered to the framework.
getModelRetrieves the model instance that has been registered using its name.
addModelRegisters a model to the framework.
removeModelRemoves a model from the framework and call the dispose method of this model.

hasCommandFunction: getCommand Function: getCommands Function: addCommand Function: removeCommand
getSequencerFunction: stopSequencerWithEvent Function: stopSequencer Function: stopAllSequencers Function: isPartOfASequence Function: getLastSequencer Function: getRunningSequencers

Functions

execute

execute: function(event)

Called automatically when the framework execute the command.

Parameter

event (soma.Event)event sent to the framework to trigger the command execution.

Variables

body (DOM element)

Get the body of the document.

this.body

instance (soma.core.Application)

Retrieves the instance of the framework.

this.instance

Functions

dispatchEvent

Dispatches an event into the framework.

Parameter

event (soma.Event)event instance
this.dispatchEvent(new soma.Event("eventType")); // generic event
this.dispatchEvent(new MyEvent("eventType")); // custom event

addEventListener

Registers an event listener object with an EventDispatcher object so that the listener receives notification of an event.

Parameter

type (string)The type of event.
listener (function)The listener function that processes the event.
priority (int)The priority level of the event listener (default: 0).
this.addEventListener("eventType", this.eventHandler.bind(this));
function eventHandler(event) {
    // do something
}

removeEventListener

Removes a listener from the EventDispatcher object.  If there is no matching listener registered with the EventDispatcher object, a call to this method has no effect.

Parameter

type (string)The type of event.
listener (function)The listener to remove.
this.removeEventListener("eventType", this.eventHandler);

hasWire

Indicates whether a wire has been registered to the framework.

Returns: a boolean

Parameter

wireName (string)Name of the wire.
this.hasWire("myWireName");

getWire

Retrieves the wire instance that has been registered using its name.

Returns: a wire instance.

Parameter

wireName (string)Name of the wire.
var myWire = this.getWire("myWireName");

addWire

Registers a wire to the framework.

Returns: the wire instance.

Parameter

wireName (string)Name of the wire.
wire (soma.core.wire.Wire)A wire instance.
this.addWire("myWireName", new MyWire());

removeWire

Removes a wire from the framework and call the dispose method of this wire.

Parameter

wireName (string)Name of the wire.
this.removeWire("myWireName");

hasModel

Indicates wether a model has been registered to the framework.

Parameter

modelName (string)Name of the model.
this.hasModel("myModelName");

getModel

Retrieves the model instance that has been registered using its name.

Returns: a model instance.

Parameter

modelName (string)Name of the model.
var myModel = this.getModel("myModelName");

addModel

Registers a model to the framework.

Returns: the model instance.

Parameter

modelName (string)Name of the model.
model (soma.core.model.Model)A model instance’
this.addModel("myModelName", new Model());

removeModel

Removes a model from the framework and call the dispose method of this model.

Parameter

modelName (string)Name of the model.
this.removeModel("myModelName");

hasView

Function: getView Function: addView Function: removeView

Function: getCommand Function: getCommands Function: addCommand Function: removeCommand

Function: stopSequencerWithEvent Function: stopSequencer Function: stopAllSequencers Function: isPartOfASequence Function: getLastSequencer Function: getRunningSequencers

Called automatically when the framework execute the command.
